0000011000111010 0110111100100010 0 -> sum: 0111010101011100, cout: 0

1011010100000010 0110000110011010 0 -> sum: 0001011010011100, cout: 1

0001101101010110 1010101101100011 0 -> sum: 1100011010111001, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
